page.title: 15Clubs in W. Itchenor
page.content: {The Itchenor Women's Institute}was founded in 1953 and holds its monthly meetings at the Memorial Hall. Its 52 members also engage in various fund-raising functions throughout the year, such as coffee mornings and jumble sales where the home baking and garden produce stalls are always popular.They support various charities including this year the Ethiopian Fund and St.Wilfrid's Hospice. The {Mother and Toddler Group }meet each weekday morning at the Memorial Hall and a Parish Day for the churches of St.James, Birdham, and St.Nicholas, Itchenor, is also held here. A numner of Itchenor residents are forming a {Community Contingency Group to deal with all types of emergency from a lost child to nuclear attacks.
